data.meaning_mnemonic: This is the same as the radical for <radical>east</radical>, so it means <kanji>east</kanji> too.
data.meaning_hint: Remember the radical mnemonic? The sun rises behind that tree in the east!
data.reading_mnemonic: You see a man walk straight toward the sun rising in the <kanji>east</kanji>. It's so bright he can't see anything, so he trips and <reading>he gash</reading>es (ひがし) his knee on a rock. Yikes… But he gets back up, determined to head east, and, oh no, he gashes his other knee! OK, he should probably give up on going east.
data.reading_hint: Imagine the secondhand pain you'd feel watching him as he gashes his knee. Ow… Surely nothing in the east can be worth that much suffering?
